scripts.debug:check-trip: node -e "(async()=>{const mongoose=(await import('mongoose')).default; const Trip=(await import('./models/Trip.js')).default; const MONGO_URI=process.env.MONGO_URI||'mongodb://localhost:27017/travel-db'; await mongoose.connect(MONGO_URI); const id=process.argv[1]; if(!id){console.error('Usage: npm run debug:check-trip -- <tripId>'); process.exit(2);} const t=await Trip.findById(id).lean(); console.log(t?JSON.stringify(t,null,2):'NOT FOUND'); process.exit(0);})();"
